welcome.name: welcome
welcome.toBeSent:
Welcome to pkBot!
You may try the following:

1. Type *vaccine* to configure search parameters and book a vaccination slot.

2. Type *book* to go right ahead to book an Appointment with pre-configured data.

vaccine.name: vaccine
vaccine.toBeSent: Please enter the name of the state. For example, Maharashtra

loadsaveddata.name: loadsaveddata
loadsaveddata.toBeSent:
Please choose yes (y) or no (n).

Use the following saved data?

State: *%s*
District: *%s*
Age: *%d*
Preferred CenterID: *%d*
BookAtAnyCenter: *%t*

If *BookAtAnyCenter* is true (choose yes), it will try to book at any available center, not limited to preferred center.

Your already saved eligible beneficiaries for first dose, if any, will be used.

state.name: state
state.toBeSent: Please enter the name of the state. For example, Maharashtra

district.name: district
district.toBeSent: Please enter the name of the district. For example, Nagpur

age.name: age
age.toBeSent: Please enter your age in years. For example, 45

bookanyslot.name: bookanyslot
bookanyslot.toBeSent:
Would you like to book at any available center within %s ?

Please choose yes (y) or no (n).

otpbeneficiary.name: otpbeneficiary
otpbeneficiary.toBeSent:
We need to get your beneficiaries details.
Please enter the OTP received on this mobile number.
Your beneficiaries will be saved so that we can attempt booking appointments when they become available.
otpbeneficiary.errorResponse2: Sorry, OTP could not be generated for authentication. Please try again!

beneficiariesupdate.name: beneficiariesupdate
beneficiariesupdate.toBeSent:
Following beneficiaries received and saved.
%s

Searching for available slots now.ðŸ¤©

search.name: search
search.toBeSent:
Go to https://selfregistration.cowin.gov.in/ immediately to book yourself 
*or* 
Enter/type the preferred center ID from the below list to attempt booking by bot
search.errorResponse2: Sorry, OTP could not be generated for authentication.

otp.name: otp
otp.toBeSent:
We have found as many as %d slot(s) for you with total %d doses available.
Please enter the OTP received on this mobile number ASAP.

beneficiaries.name: beneficiaries
beneficiaries.toBeSent:
*Skip this* if you have chosen *BookAnySlot*.

Please choose from the following beneficiaries.
Enter 1 to book only for the first beneficiary.
You can also type 1,2,3 etc. to choose multiple
%s

readcaptcha.name: readcaptcha
readcaptcha.toBeSent: Please type the exact characters (case sensitive) as you see in this CAPTCHA image

bookingconfirmation.name: bookingconfirmation
bookingconfirmation.errorResponse1:
Appointment booking failed! %s
Please try again.
